allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: implement n8n-upload command with advanced features

Add comprehensive upload functionality with ID remapping, tag management,
and upload history tracking.

**New Features:**
- 3-phase upload process with automatic ID remapping for executeWorkflow nodes
- Folder-based filtering (--folder flag) for selective uploads
- Automatic tag detection, creation, and synchronization
- Upload history tracking (.upload-history.json) with last 3 operations
- Dry-run mode for validation before upload
- Reference analysis to detect missing workflow dependencies

**New Services:**
- id-mapping-service.js: Manages workflow ID mappings across upload phases
- upload-history-service.js: Tracks upload operations and displays history
- workflow-id-remapper.js: Remaps executeWorkflow node references

**Configuration:**
- Multi-instance support via environment variables (SOURCE/TARGET)
- New upload config schema with validation

**Documentation:**
- Updated README with detailed upload examples
- Migration guides and implementation summaries
- Quick reference guides for folder filtering

**Dependencies:**
- Migrate from npm to pnpm for better performance
- Remove package-lock.json, add pnpm-workspace.yaml
- Update .gitignore for pnpm and upload history files

**Code Quality:**
- Improved filename sanitization in OutlineService
- Enhanced error handling and progress reporting
- Comprehensive test utilities included

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

feat: implement n8n-upload command with advanced features

Add comprehensive upload functionality with ID remapping, tag management,
and upload history tracking.

**New Features:**
- 3-phase upload process with automatic ID remapping for executeWorkflow nodes
- Folder-based filtering (--folder flag) for selective uploads
- Automatic tag detection, creation, and synchronization
- Upload history tracking (.upload-history.json) with last 3 operations

- Reference analysis to detect missing workflow dependencies

- upload-history-service.js: Tracks upload operations and displays history
